H0.text: The Cenozoic era is the geologic era also known as the age of mammals.

H1.text: Mesozoic era is the geologic era also known as the age of mammals.

H2.text: Paleozoic era is the geologic era also known as the age of mammals.

H3.text: The Cretaceous period is the geologic era also known as the age of mammals.

A4.text: The Cenozoic is commonly known as the Age of Mammals because the terrestrial animals that dominated both hemispheres were mammals â€“ the eutherians (placentals) in the Northern Hemisphere and the metatherians (marsupials, now mainly restricted to Australia and to some extent South America) in the Southern Hemisphere.
